8  HP4_Ladder_TPT::HP4_Ladder_TPT()

10  g(0.0),
11  g1(0.0),
12  g2(0.0),

14  g4(0.0),
15  k(0.0)

23  void HP4_Ladder_TPT::reset(double _sample_rate)
24  {
25  sample_rate = _sample_rate;
26 
27  for (int n = 0; n < 4; ++n)
28  {
29  hp[n].reset(sample_rate);
30  }
31  }
32 
33  double HP4_Ladder_TPT::process(double x)
34  {
35  // Calculate input to low-pass chain
36 
37  const double s1 = hp[0].get_state() * g4;
38  const double s2 = hp[1].get_state() * g3;
39  const double s3 = hp[2].get_state() * g2;
40  const double s4 = hp[3].get_state() * g1;
41  const double s_bar = -1.0 * (s1 + s2 + s3 + s4);
42  const double u = (x - k * s_bar) / (1 + k * g4);
43 
44  // Calculate output by processing low-pass chain
45 
46  double y = u;
47 
48  for (int n = 0; n < 4; ++n)
49  {
50  y = hp[n].process(y);
51  }
52 
53  y *= (1.0 + k); // Compensate for volume loss from increased resonance
54 
55  return y;
56  }
57 
58  void HP4_Ladder_TPT::set_cutoff(double cutoff)
59  {
60  g = cutoff / sample_rate;
61  g1 = 1.0 / (1.0 + g);
62  g2 = g1 * g1;
63  g3 = g2 * g1;
64  g4 = g3 * g1;
65 
66  const double gg = g * g1;
67 
68  for (int n = 0; n < 4; ++n)
69  {
70  hp[n].set_cutoff_g1(gg);
71  }
72  }
73 
74  void HP4_Ladder_TPT::set_q(double q_norm)
75  {
76  k = 4.0 * q_norm;
77  }
78 
79  } // filter
